Your Open Research Calendar Order
 

Hi {{2.`2`}},

This is a notification to let you know that the stickers have been dispatched. If you are in the UK you should receive them in 3-5 days. For int'l orders please expect 10-14 days.

If you haven't already done so, please consider supporting us by donating. Thank you.

Donate

All the best,
The Open Research Calendar Team
